title: Stir-fried eggs with prawns
ingredients: ['200g peeled prawns', 'A pinch of salt', '1 teaspoon Shaoxing rice wine', '1 teaspoon egg white', '1/4 teaspoon salt', '1 tablespoon cornflour', '4 eggs, beaten', '2 spring onions, finely sliced', '1 tablespoon cornflour mixed with 2 1/2 tablespoons cold water', 'a pinch white pepper', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '2 tablespoons oil']
